message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product for $9,500. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I understand your offer, I know the value of this product.  Would you consider $9,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $8,750?
